name: Go K8s Dev

"$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh"' >> /home/vscode/.zshrc && echo '[ -s "$NVM_DIR/bash_completion" ] && \. "$NVM_DIR/bash_completion"' >> /home/vscode/.zshrc && echo 'export PATH="/usr/local/share/nvm/current/bin:$PATH"' >> /home/vscode/.zshrc && npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code && echo 'Devcontainer setup complete - Node.js/npm/claude installed with proper PATH'
